Description: Deliver a working Standards Overlay Engine runtime (SOE) producing deterministic SOERun outputs from industry profiles + standards packs.
Acceptance Criteria: SOE runs end-to-end locally and in CI; produces SOERun with decisions/gates/evidence/why

Description: Fix CI so agents can iterate safely. Ensure ruff/pytest installed for api job; ensure web/ops builds succeed with lockfiles and correct working dirs.
Acceptance Criteria: CI passes on main: api/web/ops jobs succeed

Description: Create rule_expr.schema.json used by rules: operators (equals, in, contains, gt/lt, exists), plus all/any/none composition.
Acceptance Criteria: Schema validates; example rule expressions validate; referenced by rule.schema.json

Description: Implement evaluator for rule expressions and all/any/none logic. Must be deterministic and unit-tested.
Acceptance Criteria: Given same inputs, evaluator returns same boolean; unit tests cover each operator and nesting

Description: Load standards packs from standards_packs/ directory; validate pack.json + rules/*.json against schemas; surface friendly errors.
Acceptance Criteria: Loader can load Space pack set; invalid JSON fails with clear error; schema validation enforced

Description: Load profiles from industry_profiles/; resolve default packs; validate against industry_profile.schema.json.
Acceptance Criteria: Selecting profile resolves default packs and risk posture; schema validated

Description: Create SOERun builder: inputs -> decisions[]/gates[]/required_evidence[]/cost_modifiers[]. Include deterministic decision IDs.
Acceptance Criteria: SOERun produced for a sample Space Flight input; IDs deterministic across runs

Description: Implement action handlers for REQUIRE, INSERT_STEP, ADD_GATE. Inserted items must be tagged as SOE-enforced.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules can force a test + insert a process step + add a release gate; reflected in SOERun

Description: Implement cost modifiers + retention policies via SOE. Must be traceable to rule_id.
Acceptance Criteria: SOERun includes cost_modifiers[] and required_evidence[] retention derived from rules

Description: From each decision, generate a human-readable explanation: Industry + hardware_class + rule_id + citations.
Acceptance Criteria: Every enforced decision includes why.summary + citations; snapshot stable across runs

Description: Add 6–10 real Space rules: NASA polymerics clean/bake/stake/coat sequencing, TVAC/vibe/shock triggers for Flight, COA requirements, long lead EEE mitigation + A/B testing.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules validate, evaluate, and produce expected SOERun decisions for sample inputs

Description: Add 4–6 real Medical rules: IQ/OQ/PQ when new/modified process, DHR evidence bundle, lot traceability, release approvals.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules validate and produce expected SOERun decisions for sample inputs

Description: Add 4–6 real Automotive rules: PPAP core docs, lot traceability, SPC/capability triggers for production.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules validate and produce expected SOERun decisions for sample inputs

Description: Expose evaluation endpoint that accepts context input + selected profile and returns SOERun. Validate request/response with schemas.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns SOERun; invalid input returns 400 with schema error detail

Description: Create golden JSON fixtures in /examples and unit tests that compare full SOERun output to expected JSON for Space/Medical/Auto.
Acceptance Criteria: Tests pass and prove determinism; changes require intentional fixture update
